main.name: Joshua Chai
main.bio: Enthusiastic Master's student in Software Engineering with a strong background in technology and a passion for delivering exceptional customer service. Seeking the Customer Service Representative role at The Switch to leverage my technical skills, leadership experience, and commitment to community engagement to enhance resident experiences.
